content: fall is the perfect time to cozy up with a new crochet project and these granny square fingerless gloves are just what you need to add a touch of handmade coziness to your wardrobe **materials** ▢red heart yarn - saffron ▢red heart yarn - light thyme frost green ▢red heart yarn - cafe latte ▢red heart yarn - medium thyme ▢5 mm hook ▢4 5 mm hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring - magic_ring chains - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet front post double_crochet fpdc back post double_crochet bpdc slip_stitch - slip_stitch increases increase
